short_summary: Purchase space for lease in Collingwood and Wasaga Beach
description: Please refer to the English attachment.
full_summary:
====================================

**Government Tender Announcement: Invitation to Express Interest in Leasing Commercial Space**

**Reference Number**: cb-856-63992808  
**Publication Date**: July 4, 2024  
**Tender Closing Date**: July 18, 2024, 5:00 PM Eastern Time  
**Contracting Entity**: Public Services and Procurement Canada

This bid solicitation is an Invitation to Express Interest (EOI) issued by Public Services and Procurement Canada to solicit interest from potential providers for leasing commercial space in the towns of Collingwood and Wasaga Beach, Ontario.

**Services Required**: Real Estate Services, UNSPSC code 80130000

**Regions of Opportunity**: Ontario, with a focus on the towns of Collingwood and Wasaga Beach

**Notice Type**: Request for Information (RFI)  
**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

**Selection Criteria**: The selection criteria for this EOI will focus on variations or combinations of the procurement methods outlined in the attached document.

**Tender Documents**: The complete tender package, including the EOI document, is available online at [Canada Buys website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/41097/81002922-01-eoi-canadabuys-en---collingwood-and-wasaga-beach_0.pdf) and [French-language Canada Buys website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/41097/81002922-01-eoi-achatscanada-fr---collingwood-and-wasaga-beach.pdf)

**Contact Information**: For more information, please contact Adam Chothia, Contracting Authority, at adam.chothia@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca or (416) 428-3078.

Please refer to the attached documents for complete details about the Invitation to Express Interest. All interested parties are encouraged to submit their expressions of interest by the designated closing date.

P.S: All communication will be conducted in English and French, however the primary means of communication will be via the English language.

**Note:** This is a Request for Information (RFI) since the contracting entity is just trying to collect interest for leasing the space. You would not be able to submit a formal proposal however potential Providers can express their interests by replying to the EOI; get more details on EOI. Also don't forget to confirm you
